ComicInfo.Summary: “FORBIDDEN FRUIT” Penultimate Issue! When a mysterious floating island appears in the skies above Patriot City, Freedom Force is called into action to prevent the mesmerized female populace from being transformed into the willing servants of a nefarious goat-footed demigod. Even if the team can somehow overcome the awesome powers of the pipe-playing Pan, can they survive a betrayal by one of their own?
ComicInfo.Title: Forbidden Fruit
